1.content:
“Oh not again!” Stephen groaned as his car’s engine started to sputter and misfire while he and his family were still some distance from home. He vainly tried to keep it running but just as he pulled over to the side of the road...it died completely.

“I told you to take it to the mechanic last week” his pregnant wife Amanda sighed from the passenger seat as she rested her elbow on the door and put her head in her hand.

“Yeah thanks honey, that’s really helpful” he replied acerbically.

“Mommy, I need to pee!” the couple’s 6-year old daughter Kristen suddenly whined from the back seat, as her 10-year old brother Joseph sat quite content reading his comic book. Both Stephen and Amanda turned and looked at their daughter, who was fidgeting a great deal in her seat.

Stephen just let out a long frustrated sigh as he gripped the steering wheel.

At 41 years old, Stephen Pryce would tell anyone that he had seen the best years of his life, despite the ‘bullshit’ saying that “life begins at 40”. Yet for his children’s sake, his outlook on life remained optimistic, and he was always cracking jokes. He was 5’11” tall and had short black hair, shaved at the back and sides, and he kept himself clean shaven, his build was average for a man his age but he was a little hairier than a lot of men, with a thick mat of hair covering his chest and extending down to his navel. His voice was relatively deep, and he was dressed in a gray polo neck sweatshirt, a pair of denim jeans and a pair of brown hiking boots.

His wife Amanda Pryce, was 38 years old and stood 5‘4“ tall, she was a little over seven months pregnant. Her dirty blond hair was shoulder-length, and a couple of hair grips kept it out of her face. She was very pretty and she knew it, but she was a modest woman, she had breasts that were normally a C-Cup, but pregnancy had enlarged them by a full cup size or more. She had a very curvy figure, but two previous childbirths had taken its toll a little, her shapely legs however had not suffered, and according to Stephen…they were his wife’s best feature. Today she was wearing her favorite black lace underwear, a loose-fitting white blouse, a long black skirt with an elasticized waistband, and a pair of black leather flats on her aching feet. Jewelry consisted of a simple gold chain with a Christian cross attached, and her wedding/engagement rings on her fingers., which were manicured. As well as being modest, Amanda was very easy going, and it took a lot to get her angry.

Their 10-year old son Joseph, or Joe as everyone called him, was 5’1” in height and was quiet for his age, nearly always engrossed in reading his superhero comics. He had short brown hair and took after his dad in good looks. He was dressed in the type of clothing he always wore, namely t-shirts of varying color, except pink and red, corduroy pants and sneakers.

In contrast to her older brother, 6-year old Kristen was very active, sometimes a little too much, she had long blonde hair that was nearly always in a ponytail, she stood only 4’ tall and she had a very petite build. She was very cute and loved playing dress-up in her mom’s clothes whenever she was allowed, though her own clothes were just as feminine as her mother’s. Today she was wearing a short-sleeved white top, a red thigh-length skirt with little white hearts on it and a pair of black patent flats with ankle straps and ribbons on the fronts.

Stephen then stepped out of the car and took a quick look around. “Why don’t you take her behind those bushes?” he suggested to his wife, who just looked at him with a frown on her pretty face.

“I’m not doing that!” Amanda responded.

“Well, its either that or she pees herself!” Stephen pointed out, as he pointed to his daughter, who was growing more and more desperate.

Amanda herself stepped out of the car and surveyed the area, as another vehicle drove past without stopping to help the family. “Thanks for the help dickwad!” she shouted after the car.

As Stephen chuckled away to himself, his wife then pointed to the large building situated about half a mile down the road. “Why don’t we go there?” she asked, as she looked skywards at the darkening sky.

“And leave the car?” Stephen muttered in disapproval.

Amanda just shrugged and gave him a stare. “I don’t think anyone would want to steal this piece of crap honey!” she said, as she hit the roof of the car with her left hand.

“MOMMY!!” Kristen cried out again, as she struggled to ‘keep it in’.

“Look, you can stay with your precious car if you like but I’m taking the kids to that building,” Amanda decided, as she opened the back door, checked for traffic, and then told her daughter to jump out, “come on Joe, tear your eyes away from your comic” she then told her son, who let out a sigh and reluctantly did as he was told.

“Fine!” Stephen finally relented, as he reached back in the car for a few things before locking it up.
The family then took a steady walk down towards the building down the road. Upon reaching it, the couple surveyed its façade, ‘The Moriarty Arms’ was emblazoned above the rather large entrance in gold lettering. The building was immaculately kept and quite a few cars were parked in the car lot around the back. “Well, a hotel, this is lucky!” Amanda smiled, as she kept tight hold of her daughter with one hand and caressed her swollen stomach with the other. Amanda was just glad she wasn’t any further along than seven months, since she knew that they could have broken down out in the middle of nowhere, which would have been 'unfortunate'.

“Well, come on then, lets ask if they have a room available before Kristen pees her pants!” Stephen said, as he led his family inside the building. As Amanda stepped inside, a few drops of rain began to fall, a prelude to the kind of torrential downpour that occasionally drenched the area.

“We timed that well” Amanda mumbled, as she and Stephen turned to look at the rain outside.

“Good evening, I assume you’ll be wanting a room?” the female clerk behind the front desk suddenly addressed the family.

“Er…depends on the price really” Stephen replied, only to be nudged by his wife.

“For god’s sake, its only for a night or two” Amanda growled at him, as she stepped forward. “Um…yes please, there are just the four of us” she then told the receptionist.

“We only charge $130 per night, and we’ve got two available family suites on the top floor, if you’ll sign the register I’ll have someone show you to your room” the pleasant receptionist informed Amanda with a smile.

“Thank you!” Amanda said, before turning to her husband, “See how easy that was” she mumbled to Stephen, sticking her tongue out at him. She then looked down at Kristen when she suddenly pulled on her arm. “Oh…and where’s the bathroom please?” she quickly asked the receptionist,

“This way!” the clerk responded, as she rushed from behind the desk and took both Amanda and Kirsten to the toilets.

That left Stephen stood there with his young son, who lazily sat himself down near the doorway and buried his face in his comic book again, a sight that Stephen had grown accustomed to. Letting out another sigh, Stephen signed the family into the hotel, then turned around when he heard the ‘ping’ of the elevator.
1.title: Checking In.

The wedding was tomorrow, which meant Abby had to do everything in her power to make her best friend June’s last day before marriage memorable. Abby made a few phone calls and got everything she needed. She texted Kat her plans, and Kat reluctantly agreed to go along with them. Abby knew Kat hated to let loose but she also knew she would do anything to make June happy. When everything was set, Abby left her hotel room and knocked on June’s room down the hall:

“Clocks ticking, girl, open up,” Abby said after she didn’t hear her friend coming to the door.
The door opened, but on the other side was not June... it was Sylvia! Sylvia looked her up and down with her older judgemental eyes. Sure, Abby could dress promiscuously now and then, but her best friend was getting married and it was only fair she got a hook up out of it.

“Its Abby” Sylvia called back to June. Sylvia faked a smile and let Abby in.

In the room was also Hailey, working on some school work. She had taken off a week her last semester of high school to attend her sister’s wedding. Although she was happy for her sister, she could not help feeling a little resentment. Sure, Michael was a great guy, but she thought he would be much better with someone a bit more like him. Hailey knew her sister hardly ever knew what Michael was talking about, but Hailey understood him and loved to hear him speak about the things that actually matter.

When June finished washing up in the bathroom, the two friends hugged each other. After the embrace, June said, “Can you believe it's almost here? I am freaking out and I think I am even starting to break out from all these nerves”.

“It’ll be ok. Breathe. To take your mind off all this craziness, I have concocted some major plans for the three amigos. Kat will meet us at our first destination..” Abby said.

“How mysterious! I can't believe you dragged Kat into this, poor girl. But I am up for the adventure!” June exclaimed. June looked back at Sylvia sewing while watching the TV. June whispered to Abby, “We should probably take Michael’s sister, I would hate for her to feel left out.”

Abby internally screamed. This is not how she pictured the unforgettable bachelorette party. She pretended this did not bother her and she agreed.

“Sylvia, want to go for a bit of a girl’s night out with Kat, Abby, and I?” June asked her future sister-in-law.

“That sounds lovely” Sylvia replied. Internally, Sylvia also panicked. She knew she was probably in for a night of debauchery, but she promised her brother she would make an effort to make friends with his bride to be. That she could do, but she could hardly stomach Abby’s hypersexualized antics.

“Can I come too?” Hailey asked. Maybe if Hailey could let loose a little, she could forget her resentments.

“You might as well,” Abby said with a sigh.

“The five amigos it is!” June cheered. Little did they all know how unforgettable this bachelorette party would truly be.

"How old are you?"

"I am nine."

"Where do you live?"

"92-14 211th street."

"Where do you go to school?"

"P.S. 153."

"What grade are you in?"

"Third grade.

"What is your favorite subject?"

"My favorite is science."

"No I mean why are you hear? What day is it?"

"It is Investiture/Rededication day." Nick somehow knew what that meant. This was the day when girls were allowed into the girl scouts for another year. They had to go through this ceremony and if they passed they would be allowed to be in scouts for an additional year. It was treated like a test, but everyone passed. Nick didn't know how he knew this. He didn't have a daughter who was in girl scouts and he certainly had never been one either.

"What group are you going in?"

"I'm in troop 4314." This time not only could Nick feel the answer in his head, he actually spoke the answer using his own mouth.

How long have you been a girl scout?"

She was the head not just of the juniors, but of all the groups from the youngest daisies to the oldest ambassadors. You knew this facts well as you knew your own name....'Jayda Alams.' He knew her name, it was Mrs. Victoria. Next to Mrs. Victoria was her son who helped out sometimes. He was video taping with a camcorder.

"to serve my God and my country, to help people at all times, and to live by the Girl Scout Law." By the time he was finished, Nick didn't feel like he was laying down anymore. He felt like he was sitting up straight in a chair. The girl scout leader was smiling right in front of a him. He was sure that he had answered everything and that in a few minutes he would be rededicated to the Girl Scouts for another year.

"Finally," she said. "What is the Girl Scout Law?"

"I will do my best to be: Honest and fair, friendly and helpful, considerate and caring, courageous and strong...," the next line was at the tip of his tongue.

"responsibile for," Mrs. Victoria encouraged.

"Very Good. Very Good, Jayda. That's it. You passed."

And if you now follow me, as I have an errand in that direction, I also show you the lifts and our small shop where you can buy snacks, souvenirs and things you have forgotten at home. The family of five followed her closely, little Jim jumping his way forward. “And in there”, she said as she pointed, “ is our really great restaurant”.

The family peaked in through the opening, saw some guy in a tuxedo playing some nice background music on a piano on a small stage, and a fair number of guests having their dinner.

“Nice” commented Gill.

“Well I don’t know, it looks a bit on the expensive side” Jake commented silently to his wife as he noticed the two classy couples, one Caucasian and one Afro-American couple, in their 40s to 50s sitting at the closest table. The men wore dark suits of different shades, with accompanying shirt, ties and dark leather shoes. And the two women looked very classy with their slim tall bodies and in their elegant skirt suits with very elegant hairstyles. “Looks expensive”, Jake whispered to Gill.

“Don’t worry” Chloe assured, overhearing the silent conversation not aimed for her ears. “The food is really great, so we frequently get guests for business lunches and dinners, and even some local well-off people who just appreciate the quality of the food although the restaurant is not to fancy”. “And the prices are quite good for families too, as the hotel policy is to cater for all”

She continued talking while walking, and the family followed close by as they turned around a corner “and here are your elevators” she pointed at the golden metal doors. “And with your room number 401 and 402, you are getting off on floor 4 of course.”

“Thanks”, Jake and Gill coed at the same time and the receptionist started heading back but was immediately stopped by the two ladies from the restaurant, one dressed in a burgundy red skirt suit and a big blond hair crowning her head, and the other one, the Afro-American woman, dressed in black-white checkered skirt suit, black patent stiletto pumps, and a her black hair set up nicely at the back of her head to show off her beautiful slim neck. Jake could see that his wife was jealous based on the way she looked at the two women. And sure they were good looking, he thought.

“Is this the way to the Veranda?” they asked the receptionist.

“Yes just take the elevator two floors up, and then to the left and walk down the hall”

“And it is ok to have a cigarette up there?” they asked for confirmation.

“Of course” the receptionist said as she hurried away for her errand.

Dr. Moriarty had watched the family arriving, and could no longer hold back his joy at the great opportunity that had suddenly presented itself.

The family stepped into the elevator, Jim the little boy did a big jump into the elevator and shot an imaginary web on the elevator wall. The two elegant women followed in, gossiping continuously about some other woman they seemed to know.

What happens next?
124.title: Meanwhile, in the dining area.

choices: They wake up according to Moriarty’s plan
The classy women’s husband’s are looking for their wives
1241.content:
It only took seconds before the Dr. Moriarty’s gas sent the passenger to a deep sleep.

Well down in the lab, he had positioned the specimens on the lab tables.

“Well don’t stand there and wait. Get to work!” he commanded his personnel in an eager and excited voice.
I want the mum’s clothes to be fitted for the youngest boy, and his clothes to be re-tailored for the mum.

He did not need to think too much about the next step. “I want the boy’s teenager clothes be fitted to the two classy women, and the skirt suits are adapted for the boys with a perfect and snug fit”. Of course, and along with the skirt suits came the women’s exquisite make up, perfume, and expensive jewelry for the twin boys, and the women got some cheep teenage boy aftershave, and some digital stop watches in return.

Dr. Moriarty went over to his computer to work out the program for the chips that the whole assembly would be all equipped with. Dr. Moriarty decided that the father would go physically unaltered for now, but he and everyone else got programmed to assume that everything was normal, and things were as they had always been. The boy Jim and his mum Gill got some pieces of their personalities swapped.

Not entirely satisfied with the result, Dr. Moriarty threw in some last minute alterations to spice up the whole swapping thing. First, the twin boys got the women’s genitals and their surgically enlarged breasts, and the two women got the boys teenage genitals and chests. The freckles and skin colors presented some problems first. Dr. Moriarty’s team considered genetically altering the specimen’s skin, but in the end settled for using the latest full body instant healing skin grafting technique. So in the end, the boys lost their pale freckled skin, which the women got equipped with, and one boy got the Caucasian woman’s skin, whereas the other got the Afro-American woman’s skin. In this way they also swapped the hairiness, down to minute details, and hairstyles in the most efficient manner. Dr. Moriarty reassured himself.

Dr. Moriarty still thinking that something was amiss, decided to program the twin boys to believe that they are the two classy women, and the two elegant women that they were the two seemingly silent twins. Fortunately, the tailors have foreseen this last minute change of genitals, breasts with chests, and tailored the clothes to fit the boys and women given their new equipment.

"Hehehe, I wonder how their husbands in the restaurant will react when they get back those two", Dr. Moriarty mustered as he watched the twin boys with their somewhat more robust body constructs and male faces and imagined them insisting that they were the (trophy)wives of the two rich businessmen in the restaurant. "Hahaha…" And he let them all keep their original voices, but swapped the speech patterns accordingly.

Dr. Moriarty placed the passengers back in the elevator, even succeeded to make them standing upright by leaning them against each other, while the two new classy women were positioned on the two small seats at the back of the elevator, and he then used his speed wake-up gas he recently had developed. In this way, his treated guest would not even notice that they dosed off.

What happens subsequently?
1241.title: They are sent down to the basement

choices: Follow the former twin boys out on the veranda?
Follow the former classy women’s husbands in their search for their wives?
12411.content:
In an instant, as they were sent up again in the elevator, they woke up. Dr. Moriarty watched on his monitors and listened from the speaker with not so little amusement at what would now proceed.

One of the boys, the one now dressed in a classy burgundy red skirt suit, and shiny red and very high spiky heels from the former lady in front of him (of which he of course know nothing about now. It was just some anonymous teenage boy), quickly and without a moment of hesitation pulled up a golden tube of lipstick from his red purse dangling in a golden chain strap resting over his shoulder. He quickly touched up his lips and checked the result as he pursed his lips while looking in the elevator mirror and ending with a smug satisfactory smile as he patted his blond big hair in place. His twin brother, who was now wearing a Chanel like black-white checkered skirt suit, a black designer purse and an ivory colored satin blouse, and not the least a beautiful black woman’s skin formerly owned by the woman standing in front of him, complimented him with a “I really like that shade on your lipstick. It looks great on you Catherine”. “I know….” his twin brother agreed happily.

The elevator stopped on the third floor. “So let’s go Lorraine”, the new Catherine said. “Oh yes” ”, I am just dying to get outside” responded the new Loraine. And the boys made their way past their old family and the former two women in their new pale and freckled skin who watched the two classy ladies walk out and take to the left.

Unbeknownst to the two “women” leaving the elevator, they had been caught by an imaginary spider web from behind as they made their way out to the left, but that did if course not stop their determined strides.
The new much slimmer version of the twins said nothing, but in their mind they were thinking about playing world of war craft later on that night.

As the doors closed the little boy now kept his hand resting on his white purse stood their dressed in his mum’s re-sized white heels, beige pencil skirt, silver pendent, and her former white top that would normally show of his mum’s cleavage. The boy who had also got his mother's fashion sense, looked up to his mum. “Mum, mum, I also want to have clothes like them. I can have them like on my friend’s birthday parties”. “Sure honey, we will go and hmmmhhfp and then …hmmpfff. “ “What mum, what did you say?”, the boy asked eager to know if he could or not. Gill, his mum tried again “Darling sweat heart, hmmpffp mm hmpfff”. The boy looked confused at his mother, not able to comprehend a single word what she tried to say.

“Honey, how many times have I told you that we can’t hear what you are saying when you cover your head in that spider man suit”, Jake told his wife somewhat irritated. Dr. Moriarty looked on flabbergasted. “Can’t you take it off honey”, “Please”, And Gill crossed her arms, pretended to zip her mouth into silence, and shook her head

defiantly. At this stage, Dr. Moriarty had lost it all and lay crawling on the floor in the lab, laughing insanely with a cramping stomach. As the elevator opened on the fourth floor Jake’s wife Gill jumped out and shoot some imagined beams of spider web to the right and then to the left in the corridor, as if any bad person were waiting for them. Dr. Moriarty could see how ashamed the whole family was for their mum’s childish and over-energetic behavior.

Where do we go from here?
12411.title: They wake up according to Moriarty’s plan

124111.content:
"Hmm, smell that air Lorraine, I love this place!" "Catherine" said as the two boys walked out onto the veranda, their heels clicking in unison. "Hmm...yes, very nice" "Lorraine" responded, as he got a cigarette out of his purse and lit it up.

"Filthy habit sweetie!" the Caucasian 'boy' then said to his dark-skinned brother.

"But very satisfying!" the second boy responded to his brother's comment as he blew a stream of smoke out through his painted lips.

The two teenage boys did indeed look peculiar. Both now not only had the personalities of two grown women, but they now had elegant hair, large fake breasts and vaginas too, courtesy of Catherine and Lorraine (and of course Professor Moriarty). They made their way over to a bench and sat down, crossing their legs in a very feminine style. They began chatting about this and that, all the while Moriarty was observing on a hidden camera situated outside.

"Wonderful!" He said gleefully, rubbing his hands together. "The husbands are in for a surprise indeed" he then chortled to himself.

"My bra is digging in!" "Lorraine" suddenly grumbled, as he adjusted his strap.

"Then go a size up!" "Catherine" responded.

"My bra or my breasts?" the black boy then chuckled, eliciting a similar giggle from his brother. "I've already gone up two cup sizes, I don't think the hubby will pay for making them any bigger" he then commented, as he felt his large boobs.

"Hmm, mine will pay for whatever I want" the white boy bragged, as he wafted the cigarette smoke away from him.

Suddenly the pair were interrupted by a couple of other hotel guests, new arrivals in fact. A couple of British tourists (from a group of four), a man and a woman, clearly friends but not in a relationship. The man, Steven, was 33 and about 6ft tall, had a close shaved head, was wearing glasses and was also quite slender. He was wearing a blue t-shirt, a pair of black jeans, socks and a pair of brown hiking boots. His female friend, Liz, was three years younger at 30, standing 5' 4" tall, and her light brown hair was up in a ponytail. Liz was dressed in a black tank top (that gave a teasing view of her large (and natural) 30H breasts, a pair of white capri trousers and a pair of black leather flats. A large tattoo of two dolphins could be seen on her lower back.

"Oh...sorry!" Liz apologized to "Lorraine" and "Catherine" when she saw they had interrupted a conversation with their boisterous laughing and talking. But then..both Liz and Steven took a closer look at the two 'women', and they couldn't believe what they were seeing. "What the...?" Steven started saying, before Liz put her hand over his mouth.

"Is there a problem?" the dark-skinned brother asked the two tourists, as he continued puffing on his cigarette.

"Um...no, no...not at all, we're sorry for staring" Liz replied with a nervous smile. She couldn't believe what was in front of them, what looked like two teenage boys in drag, but both of them obviously had huge breasts and real hair. "Weird!" Liz thought to herself, as Steven picked his jaw up off the ground.

Meanwhile, Moriarty was watching intently, and with interest.
124111.title: Follow the former twin boys out on the veranda?

choices: The boys are abducted by Doctor
The parents are abducted by the Doctor
The next morning... everything is different
1243.content:
The elevator doors began to close, and the parents of the spider-man dressed boy called for someone to hold it. The good Doctor obliged and held out his hand to catch the closing doors. They opened for the rest of the boy's family to join. "Thank you." Jake said, giving the stranger a friendly smile.

"Not at all." Dr Moriarty politely replied. He had dressed in a pressed elevator operator uniform. "You have a charming family. What floor?"

"Oh, it was... floor 4." Jake said after taking glance at the two keys in his hand, and the doctor pressed on the button for the forth floor. The elevator rose without so much as shaking the floor.

"Top floor for us." One of the two classy women said in a snobish tone.

"Of course." The Doctor pressed the button. "Here for a luxurious family vacation?" He asked the Anderson's

The spider-man boy, Jim, was impatiently crouching and shooting imaginary webs at the classy girls, which they did not seem to like. Gill was trying to control her son. The twin sons were back in the opposite corner whispering to each other in hushed voices. Gill, impatiently nodded her head, "Yes, that is what we hope. Some... quality family time."

"I think you'll find that the The Moriarty Arms has a lot of... unique experiences to offer." The doctor said with a devious smile, that no one seemed to notice but the twin boys. They stared at him with matching questioning looks, but still remained silent. "And here is your floor."

All of the Anderson's stepped out, with Jim running off down the hall to their room. When the elevator doors closed, Dr Moriarty turned his attention to the lovely women still impatiently waiting in the elevator.

Spider-man boy tried to open the door to his room, but failed without the key. Jake handed the 401 key to one of his twin boys. "You both are in charge. Don't let your brother destroy the room, and don't leave him alone!"

"But Dad!" both of the twin teens complained, but Gill cut them off.

"Why don't the three of you hang out at the pool when your suitcases come up? I'm sure there is a lot of fun things to do there." Gill said more softly then her husband.

"Fine!" The twin with the key said before heading over to unlock the door. Once unlocked, Jim rushed inside to look around, followed by his twin brothers. Jake and Gill could hear one of their twin sons yell, "No Jim, your sleeping on the couch! Me and--" the door closed and muffled the rest.

"I told you to get three beds for them." Gill said to her husband as he unlocked their door, the room .

"They'll figure it out. For now, lets just have 'us time." Jake held the door for his wife as they stepped into their room. The room was incredibly luxurious, almost too much so for the price. Surprisingly, their luggage was already in the room. However, Jake focused on the expensive looking room. "Maybe I should have another chat with the boys; I don't want to pay for them breaking--"

"They'll be fine." Gill said as she walked up close to her husband. "You still owe me a date night."
1243.title: Dr. Moriarty is in the elevator

12431.content:
"No Jim, your sleeping on the couch! Me and Gideon get the beds!" Gadiel said to his annoying younger brother as the door to their room shut. But Jim was already jumping on the one closest to the window. "Jim!" Gadiel yelled again.

Gideon walked over to his bouncing brother and grabbed his arms. "Come on Jim, go play spider-man in the bathroom while you get dressed for the pool!" He gently said, redirecting Jim's attention.

"Yeah, good idea!" Jim happily said. He bounced off the bed and ran towards the bathroom. Closing the door behind him, he proceeded to spit invisible webs into the bathtub.

Gadiel turned to his twin, "How can you always get him to do what you want?"

"Well, if you didn't start out with 'No Jim,' he probably would be more receptive." Gideon smiled at his twin. "Besides, he didn't do exactly what I wanted. He forgot to get his bathing suit." Gideon grabbed his younger brother's spider-man suitcase and pulled out the swimming shorts.

Before either Gideon could bring the bathing suite to the bathroom, both twins heard sound, like Jim had collapsed. Both rushed to the bathroom, and found a shirtless Jim on the floor. "Jim!" Gadiel yelled. He rushed in, with Gideon on his tail.

Several things then happened at once, the door to the bathroom suddenly shut itself and locked. Gadiel knelt down beside his annoying little brother to make sure he was alright. Gideon turned about and tried to open the door to no avail. Next, a mysterious odor filled both noses of both twins, and they collapsed too.

******

Jim slowly peeked his eyes open. "Ugh... What..." All he knew was that he was groggy. His brain felt sluggish, and he couldn't remember where he was. As his eyes opened wider, the blurry image of a room came into view, the hotel room he was sharing with his twin brothers.

"Where... How did I... get in here?" Jim tried to sit up, but felt a wave of dizziness. Staying on his back was a better choice, besides the bed was comfy. Carefully, he brought two left hands to rub the forehead, and a right arm to scratch his tummy. "Wait!"

Jim's eyes opened with a start. He gawked at the hands he brought into view; he had six hands, three right and three left. "What?" Jim was a little panicked. He sat up quickly, to get a better look. That was a bad idea. Another wave of dizziness washed over him. He brought a right and left hand up to rub his face, and another set of hands held him in a sitting position. He rubbed his two remaining hands together in front of him. "What is happening to me?" Jim said, trying not to cry. He did not understand.

The two hands that he was rubbing together, began to get sweaty and sticky. Jim opened up his eyes again to look at them; they were covered in a silk like substance, like a, "Spider-silk? How?" Jim slowly pulled his hands apart. "Well, that is kind of cool." Jim said to himself, trying to find something good about this bizarre situation.

A soft moan, to his right, caught Jim's attention, on the bed next to him were his twin brothers. They were asleep. Their heads were lightly pressed against each other, and Gadiel was drooling on the corner of his lip. They had the covers over themselves, and seemed to be sleeping peacefully. But, Jim continued to stare; something did not look right.

Ignoring his own changes for now, Jim pushed himself off his bed, and onto his wobbly feet. "At least I still only have two of those." Jim commented to himself. He walked around to where his older brothers were sleeping, and stopped beside Gideon's side. He didn't understand why they were sleeping in the same bed... they hated sharing a room!

Jim watched as a chest rose and fell as Gideon breathed; the same chest seemed to rise and fall when Gadiel breathed too. Jim had a sickening feeling grow deep in his stomach. He carefully, pulled back the covers with two of his right hands. Thankfully, his third right hand was on the nightstand, supporting him from falling back due to the shock. His two brothers only had one body between them!
12431.title: Three changed boys

124312.content:
Jim continued to stare in utter shock; his mouth hung wide open. Lying on the bed in front of him were his older twin brothers. Their near identical faces resting in a blissful sleep, unaware of anything. Unaware that they were now conjoined twins. "Wh-what happened... What happened to us?" He failed in holding back the tears and fell back onto the bed he woke from. Jim's breathing quickened. It grew faster and faster. The breathes grew shallower. Panic was overwhelming him.

"Sssssshhhhhh.... You probably don't want to wake them just yet." A calm voice said.

Jim, fighting to control his breathing, looked up. By the door to the hallway, an older man was quietly looking at Jim, with a finger still on his lips. The man looked familiar to Jim, but he could not place his face.

The man dropped the hand holding a finger to his mouth and gave him a small smile. His eyes had a devilish gleam about them. "I'd imagine that your brothers will have a greater reaction on waking than you did. Best let them rest for now." The man took a few steps closer, and Jim reacted by scooting further away on the bed. "No need to be frightened my boy." The man said, stopping in the middle of the room. "I thought you would want to personally thank me for the gift I have given you, and your family."

"Wh-What... gift?" Jim asked in a small voice.

"Yes, a gift. Each of you got one." The man's smile grew brighter. "But... I can see that you might need some time to fully appreciate what I have offered you here at my hotel."

"You-Your hotel? Moriarty?" Jim asked.

Ignoring Jim's question, Moriarty turned and headed for the door to the hallway. Opening the door to the hallway, Moriarty stopped halfway out and turned to looked at Jim. "Have a wonderful stay."

Jim raised one of his left hands towards the door and yelled, "Wait!" A web string shot out from that hand and hit the top corner of the door, leaving a strong cobweb. Moriarty was gone.
124312.title: Doctor Moriarty silently steps in

choices: Jake explains he is really Jake
12433.content:
Jake woke the next morning feeling a little sick. He wanted to complain to his mom and dad, but they didn't seem to be around. In fact, he didn't even seem to be in his own room. For some reason, he had fallen asleep on a couch somewhere -- it appeared to be someone else's room. He shrugged it off, heading down to the hotel's restaurant to find some breakfast and hoped to find his family as well.

He made his way to the restaurant and was a little surprised when the waitress sat him at his own table all by himself. It was like she was treating him like a grown-up. He didn't care. He was just hungry. He grabbed as much as he could from the buffet, and as he started to chow down, he heard a familiar voice.

"Honey, please settle down, and stop pretending." It was his mom.

"I'm not your 'honey.' I'm not your son at all, despite what I may look like. I am a grown woman, and you need to stop treating me like this." Jake recognized what sounded like his own voice.

"Yesterday it was spiderman, and today you claim to be a grown woman." His father sighed, "I preferred spiderman."

Jake decided he'd turn around. He was a little taken aback to see his own body. It was even weirder when he realized he was looking down at it. How had he gotten so tall? He saw his own body quickly grow furious.

"How did you do this to me, you brat?" He heard his own body ask, "And what did you do to me? You couldn't have even combed my hair or cleaned my smeared makeup off my face? Or change my clothes? I fell asleep in those after drinking way too much last night."

It was at this moment Jake suddenly became aware of his body. The long blonde hair, the red halter top half tucked into the black pencil skirt, the heels, and the large breasts.

"Whoa," Jake muttered under his breath.
12433.title: The next morning... everything is different

124332.content:
"You have to excuse him," Jake's mother told Jake, "He has such a vivid imagination."

"It's okay. He's just a dumb little boy. I am an awesome older lady person who can totally forgive stupid little boys, because I am so awesome and cool like that." Jake replied as he grabbed an armful of food off his table, stuffed a cinnamon bun in mouth, and went back upstairs to Sarah's room.

When Jake arrived, he found a woman inside crying. It was Elizabeth, or at least her body. He didn't quite know what to say.

Finally, he blurted out, "This is my room...I think."

Between sniffles, the woman asked, "You think? Did it happen to you too?"

"What happen?"

"Some sort of body swapping. I don't know why I am so emotional in this body. I'm usually the strong one. I just want to find my wife."

"I can help!" Jake spoke loudly before adding with a whisper, "I'm a superhero. I'm spiderman!"
124332.title: Jake pretends to be Sarah

choices: Jake and Frank look for his wife
1243321.content:
A big smile grew upon Elizabeth's face. "You like Spiderman??? I love Spiderman! I watch him everyday. Well when I don't have school. My friends say that Batman or Superman are better. But I just love him. I like that he isn't an adult like all the rest. He's a kid and has all these problems. I wish I could watch him all the time. Sometimes I record him on the DVR, but my wife won't let me do that everyday. Sometimes my wife can be a real meanie sometimes." Elizabeth rambled on. She felt much better now that she wasn't concentrating on her problem.

"What's your name?" Jake asked.

"My name is Frank. I know I don't look like a Frank, but I am. I wish my wife was here. She could make everything better. She scares all the monsters away from under the bed. And when I'm sad, she makes me a nice warm grilled cheese with some chocolate milk. It is so good and it makes me feel better. I know I said she is a meanie, but she is really great too. She is the best wife." Frank didn't mention the more adult ways that make her the best wife. But she smiled at that as she thought about it.

"I bet she is. Do you know what room you are in?"

"I'm on the sixth floor. I'm not sure of the room. But I think I'll know it when I see it."

"OK, I'll take you there."

"Fine, but I can't go out like this?"

"What is wrong?"

"I've been crying. I must look a mess. I have to fix my makeup first. Then we can go. It should only take a minute," and then she scampered to the bathroom. Twenty minutes later as Jake waited outside impatiently, Frank came out of the bathroom. All hint of crying was gone and his makeup was reapplied expertly on his eyeglass dominated face. He still wore the sweater he checked in with that highlighted his moderate sized breasts. You could see the hint of pantyhose he wore between his boots and knee-length skirt. With someone to help him find his way, Frank returned to the very pretty and sharp appearance that Elizabeth had when she entered the hotel.

Down at in the lab, Dr. Moriarty was satisfied with the way the three people that now made up Frank/Elizabeth's personality were all interacting to make her the person she is.
1243321.title: Jake helps

choices: Moriarty lets her go, but keeps the pieces all separated
12433211.content:
Elizabeth woke up with a foul taste in her mouth. It was like an odd mix of pickle brine and pool water. Her body felt sore. She tried to rub her eyes, but her hands could only feel cool, smooth metal -- like a table of some sort. She opened her eyes to discover her head was surrounded by glass. She looked around. From best she could tell, she had no body. Yet she could still FEEL every part of it -- though she couldn't seem to reach her hands to touch any of it.

"Oh, you've awoken," Dr. Moriarty greeted her.

"What's going on here?" Elizabeth asked.

"There was this man named Frank. I had separated all his body parts. Your brain is sending signals to them now. I didn't expect you to wake up until I had put them back together again, but this might be far more interesting."

"You put my brain into a man's body?" Elizabeth shrieked.

"Oh, heaven's no! Your brain is right here." Moriarty pulled out a jar with many wires connected, "It is merely sending signals to all of Frank's parts, which are quite scattered about. The wi-fi signal this jar creates is quite powerful. His arms are on the floor over there."

Elizabeth could see that she was moving the arms clear across the room on the floor. He made a fist, but there was little she could do.
12433211.title: What happened to Frank's body

choices: What happened to the 'litte' boy who was part of the trio
124332112.content:
Well leaving Elizabeth in pieces was a fun experiment, but it really couldn't go on forever. Dr. Moriarty put Frank together including putting Elizabeth's brain inside. Then he removed her memory of the experience and placed her back in the elevator. When Elizabeth came to, her body was all wrong to her but her clothing was perfectly fine. Like Frank her mind is now a cross of three people. She had aspects of Frank, Elizabeth and a small child.

She got to her room and found no one there. Frank and Jake had vacated the room fifteen minutes before she arrived. She knew she had come with her friend Sarah, but Sarah could not be found. Sarah wasn't answering her cell phone. Elizabeth didn't know what to do, she wasn't thinking right either, she had all the likes and dislikes of a grown man, but she had mostly the intellect of a small child. But unlike the Frank that left the room a few minutes before, she had the maturity of a grown woman. She knew she was in trouble, looking at her male body was a clear indication. She wanted to cry but she couldn't let herself fall apart.

She could call her boyfriend, but he wasn't here. She loved her boyfriend, but with her scrambled brains, she didn't think of him like a boyfriend anymore. Even though she called him her boyfriend, she felt like he was her wife. If you asked her, she would say her boyfriend was a traditional boyfriend and had been raised that way. He was a homemaker and took care of their children. Despite having the intellect of a small child, Elizabeth knew she worked at a museum and she was the sole breadwinner of her family, which included her boyfriend Roy and their children. She thought that Roy was a stay at home 'mom' and 'housewife.' Roy had given up his job after becoming pregnant with their first child or so Elizabeth remembered.

Elizabeth remembered coming to the hotel with her friend Sarah. Sarah was looking to find a new boyfriend, but Elizabeth was here mostly to play sports and get away from her family for a few days.

Elizabeth had been wearing the same clothes (but not the same body) since yesterday. She decided she should change into something fresher. She wanted to take a shower, but when she looked around, she couldn't find her clothing. There was all this feminine garb in her drawers, not the male shirts and pants etc that she had brought with her. She decided to take one anyway, she'd put back on her old clothes when done. Not ideal but better than nothing. In the bathroom she couldn't find her shaving kit or aftershave. There was a 'pink razor' but she couldn't shave her face with that, maybe the shower could wait. She wasn't sure if she wanted to see her new body naked.

What happens next?
124332112.title: Moriarty pieces her together

1243321123.content:
Elizabeth finished her shower and looked for some clothes. Despite thinking her male clothes must be around, she eventually settled on wearing female clothes. They were the only thing in her room, so they must be hers, right? It seemed like a logical conclusion. She slipped on underwear, which was strained on her male frame, then went for more clothes. Nothing seemed to fit right. Of course, part of this was Moriarty's doing. He hadn't put Frank's body together perfectly for Elizabeth. In fact, he had switched her arms and legs, while keeping her hands and feet in their rightful place. This meant her legs went from her shoulders to her hands, and her arms went from her waist to her feet on the floor. In had the effect of her appearing to have very long and thick arms with very short and skinny legs. Amanda got off the phone and turned around. Stephen was surprised to see that he now sported a full beard, and his hairline was starting to recede. "I'll watch him until someone comes up," he told Michelle. "You should sit down...you are pregnant."

Michelle nodded. "I actually really need to go...this baby is pressing on my bladder..." She headed into the bathroom.

Amanda looked at Stephen. "Now, what do you have to say for yourself?"

"I do not know what is going on. You were pregnant, now he iz pregnant..." Stephen insisted.

"Look...I'm not sure what you are talking about...but SHE is certainly pregnant. And I've never been. And you are the only strange thing in this equation."
13411121121213.title: Something Else

choices: Stephen Protests and Heads into the Bathroom to find the Maid's Uniform
134111211212131.content:
Stephen tried in vain to argue the point. They both paused when the toilet flushed and Michelle emerged from the bathroom. She wasn't wearing her maid's uniform any longer, instead wearing a white blouse and black skirt.

"Why don't we just forget this whole thing happened?" Michelle suggested. "I really just want to settle in and lie down."

Amanda looked at Stephen. "I'm okay with that if we have no more trouble."
134111211212131.title: Michelle returns from the bathroom, having chan...

choices: Stephen still doesn't notice any changes in himself
Stephen doesn't notice any changes in anyone any longer
1341112112121311.content:
"What are you doing wearing that, madame?" Stephen asked.

"Wearing what?"

"You were..." Stephen started. "And...she was...and..."

He rushed into the bathroom to look for the maid's uniform. She must have left it in there. He desperately needed something to substantiate his story...unless he was going crazy, which was starting to seem like a possibility. People didn't just change.

He didn't see it. He looked behind the door and everywhere it could be. Nothing. Then...he suddenly felt dizzy.

Someone banged on the door. "Are you all right in there?"

Stephen blinked. He stumbled for a moment, unsteadily on his high heels and opened thedoor
1341112112121311.title: Stephen Protests and Heads into the Bathroom to...

1341112112121312.content:
Lying down sounded like a good idea to Stephen. "Fine, fine. I won't be any trouble, I'm just going to take a nap. What he was seeing was clearly impossible, maybe he was having a break down. But before going to the looney bin Stephen decided to take some self help and take a nap. If things weren't normal afterwards then he would do what he had to do.

"Honey," Amanda's voice said waking Stephen up. "How are you feeling?"

Stephen woke up, he was under some covered but what he saw gladdened his heart. Amanda was standing in front of him at the side of the bed. She looked just as he had remembered, She was back to her usual five foot four, seven months pregnant and had her amply endowed (due to pregnancy) boobs. She looked perfectly normal from her dirty blonde hair to her pregnant belly. Stephen thought that it must have been a dream. "I'm feeling OK."

"Nothing wrong? No strange people. No monsters?"

"Everything is back to normal." Stephen didn't understand what Amanda meant by monsters but he didn't want to pursue it. Stephen was just happy that his wife was back to herself.

"Great."

A moment later, Stephen saw himself enter the room. It wasn't himself, but someone who looked like him. He knew the face well he saw it in the mirror everyday.

"How's my little princess?" the other Stephen asked.

"She is doing great," Amanda enthused. "She isn't seeing any more monsters or anything else weird."

"Wonderful," the other Stephen said. Now give your daddy a great big hug!!!"

Stephen looked at the bump he made in the blankets he was under. It was way too small for a grown man. He pulled back the cover to look at himself and saw the body of a little girl. He was wearing a short-sleeved white top, a red thigh-length skirt with little white hearts on it. He recognized the outfit as what six-year old Kristen had been wearing. He brought his small hands to his face and knew they were the hands of a little girl. The other Stephen grabbed him and lifted him out of the bed and gave him a big hug before Stephen could do anything.

What happens next?
1341112112121312.title: Stephen finds himself agreeing

choices: Stephen Lies and Claims He Doesn't Remember
1341112113.content:
Stephen felt weak in the knees. His legs suddenly gave out from under him and he fainted.

When he woke up, he was lying on a hotel room bed, and an older gentleman was standing over him. "I'm Doctor Moriarty," he said. "You gave everyone a bit of a fright there."

"Moriarty...like the hotel?" He said, weakly.

"Exactly. Call it...a retirement investment. I don't see patients anymore, but when I heard someone had an emergency..."

"They said you were speaking incoherently, and then fainted. Do you remember what you were saying?"
1341112113.title: Stephen faints...or maybe its gas

13411121133.content:
"No...I..." Stephen paused, "I can't seem to remember."

"Can you tell me your name?" Moriarty asked.

"Stephanie," Stephen replied.

"What can you remember, Stephanie?"

"I'm just checked in here for the night." He tucked uncomfortably on the hem of his leather skirt, "I have an appointment with a doctor in the morning." He rubbed the tummy under his black t-shirt while whispering, "I am going to be getting an abortion."

"There's no need to be shy or secretive. I'm not judgmental. I am a doctor myself, after all."

"I just...I didn't...I don't want my parents to know. I'm 18; I'm old enough to make my own decisions, but they'd freak. Knowing I was having sex would make them panic enough. They still think of me as their little angel. I don't exactly LOOK like an angel, do I? You'd think they'd figure it out."

Moriarty looked at Stephen's new form. He was now a young woman, 18 years old, wearing a ratty black t-shirt, black leather skirt, shiny black leggings, and tall black boots. She wasn't quite "goth," but she certainly seemed dark. Stephanie's personality would be dominant until he heard a certain word, then Stephen's own memories would come rushing back. Of course, Moriarty didn't want that to happen just yet; he wanted just the right moment for Stephen to remember who he really was and become truly shocked with his new body.
13411121133.title: Something Else

choices: They Go to See the Manager
13412.content:
"Look, buddy, I don't know what the hell is going on here but this isn't obviously your baby. For the simple fact that you're a dude," he shouted, crouching down and lifting up the hem of the dress. He was very surprised when what he expected was not there...namely, a penis.

"A dude?" The man said. He appeared legitimately shocked. "I do not have to stay here and be insulted," he said, in the same thick accent."

Stephen stared, momentarily confused. Was this just a really manly looking woman? If so, her demeanor certainly wasn't matching her appearance. There was definitely something wrong, but he was more confused than ever. "Look..."

"I am carrying your child and you do not even remember my name?" He said, becoming a bit huffy. "It is Michelle."

"Look, Michelle...Let me lay it out for you," he said. "I came in here with my pregnant wife. She took my daughter to the bathroom. You passed by...and weren't pregnant. I waited for my wife some more...she came back and isn't pregnant. You pass by again...pregnant."

Michelle looked at him. "And just how, monseiur...did I do this? Steal ze baby?" He pulled up his dress a bit further. There were no marks of any kind. "Perhaps I swallowed it, no?" He pulled his dress back down and made a noise. "Or perhaps you were looking somewhere other than here...and did not see the baby the first time?" He asked.

It sounded rational and logical...more so than his version of the story. But he'd been so certain...and there were still a few things he didn't understand.

Michelle sighed what sounded like a long suffering sigh. He was done with being flirty. "Come...we will go sort this out," he said.
13412.title: There's not a penis there

134121.content:
Michelle sighed what sounded like a long suffering sigh. He was done with being flirty. "Come...we will go sort this out," he said.

He fished his key out of his pocket. He had one key, and his wife had the other. "Fine," he said. At least his son would back him up on this. They headed down the hall. "So, how did you get pregnant then?" He said.

"I..how you say...love love," the maid told him. "I should be more responsible, no?"

"Well, it's none of my business," he said. "But any kid of yours would probably appreciate it."

"Oui," he said, agreeing.

They arrived at the room.
134121.title: They Go to Stephen's Room

1341211.content:
When he entered, the room was completely empty. He paused, confused. He'd told his family to go straight here. "They were supposed to..." he turned to see Michelle closing the door behind him and moving toward the bed, slipping out of his heels

The maid had a grin on his face. "Naughty monsieur, telling me such stories. You did not have to make up excuses to get me alone."

"This is all a mistake," he said. "My wife is supposed to be here."

"I do not go in for that sort of thing, monsieur," she said.

"My name is Stephen Pryce. I came here with my wife and two children, and I do not know what the hell is going on here," he insisted. "I'm going to call the manager."

The maid sat on the edge of the bed. "Oui," she agreed.

He headed toward the phone to call down to the desk. He was reading the instructions when he heard a thump. Michelle had fallen back on the bed, passed out.

He dropped the phone and went to shake him, but there was no response. "What the..." he started, before he suddenly passed out himself, falling on top of the other prone form.
1341211.title: The Room is Unoccupied

13412111.content:
Professor Moriarty watched as Stephen and Michelle were wheeled into his laboratory. He had been having a little fun with Stephen and he didn't see any reason for that to end.

As for Michelle, he'd been here for a bit, having started out as Mike. He'd combined many traits to get Michelle, the flirty maid. But his changes, while Moriarty waited for the right set of circumstances, had been mental.

Amanda lay prone nearby. He'd already worked on her once today. A transplant of her unborn child, as well as some associated plumbing. But he'd been in a rush. He had more time now.

He once again hooked Michelle and Amanda up to his machinery. It was really a shame that Stephen did not want to play around with the French maid. The Professor looked down at the man in the French maid's uniform. Perhaps some tweaking was required. Fortunately, he had some new supplies to work with.

He ordered his assistants to strip them all and got to work hooking up neural probes to Amanda and Michelle. He left Stephen alone in the corner. He had no intention of letting his fun come to an end yet.
13412111.title: To The Lab

134121111.content:
Stephen sat upright in bed with a start. The last thing he remembered was passing out. Had it all been a dream? The maid, the baby?

He turned, almost ready to tell Amanda what a nightmare he'd had when he saw who was sleeping next to him. It was Michelle...the maid. But, Michelle had looked pretty much like a boy in a dress. The naked form next to him had the same face...but...everything else was different.

The facial features had turned delicate and soft, the hair long, and large breasts hung over a pregnant belly, which was supported by shapely legs that looked very familiar. Michelle had gone from looking like a cross-dresser to a twenty year old knockout.

He shook her awake. He couldn't think of her as a man anymore...there was no doubt as to her gender. Why had there been before?

She stirred, looking him in the eyes. "Is it morning, Stephen?" she asked, stretching comfortably.

He hadn't told her his name.

Down in the lab, Professor Moriarty cackled evilly. He'd turned Michelle into a full fledged woman, with the same flirty personality, but now with Amanda's intimate knowledge of Stephen. He wondered how long Stephen could resist a flirty young Frenchwoman who now knew more about him than he did himself. Or would his desire to find his family outweigh that?

He looked down at the prone forms of Amanda, Kristin, and Joseph. Perhaps he'd better make them a bit harder to find.
134121111.title: Stephen Wakes Up

1341211111.content:
She stirred, looking him in the eyes. "Is it morning, Stephen?" she asked, stretching comfortably. He hadn't told her his name. She cupped his face, and kissed him deeply. It was oddly familiar, incredible, and very disturbing. When she finally stopped, he just looked at her, dumbfounded.

She got up. "I am going to take a shower," she said. She had a wicked look on her face. "There is room for two..." she said, suggestively.

"I...I..." he stumbled.

"Well, do not wait too long to decide, or I will be done and I cannot reach ze small of my back...and it is so so dirty," she said. She headed to the bathroom, putting on a show for him with every step.

When the door closed, he jumped up. He didn't see his clothes anywhere. He ran for the closet and opened it. Two sets of clothes. Some he recognized as his. The others seemed to be very attractive looking maternity clothes. "This isn't happening," he insisted to himself. He ran out into the hall.
1341211111.title: Stephen and Michelle

13412112.content: How about a few alternate options?
13412112.title: Something Else

134121121.content:
Professor Moriarty watched as Stephen and Michelle were wheeled into his laboratory. He had been having a little fun with Stephen and he didn't see any reason for that to end.

It was really a shame that Stephen did not want to play around with the French maid. The Professor looked down at the man in the French maid's uniform. Perhaps Michelle needed some additional work.

He hooked Stephen up to his machinery and looked over at the options he had, between Amanda, Kristin, Joe, and Michelle.
134121121.title: The Doc works on Stephen

1341211211.content:
Dr. Moriarty takes out the swapping helmets and attaches them to both Stephen and his six year old daughter Kristen. He swaps their emotional maturity and sends them back to their room.

Once back in their room, Stephen who is over forty years old approaches his six-year-old daughter. "Kristen," Stephen says hesitantly, "can I talk to you?"

Kristen knew immediately from the tone in his voice that something was bothering him. "Sure honey," Kristen said with a smile trying to reassure Stephen.

"Kristen can you sleep with me and Mommy tonight?" Stephen said in a low tone while looking at the floor trying to avoid eye contact.

"Sleep with you and mommy? Why would you want me to do that. You know mommies and daddies are supposed to sleep alone."

"I know, but I thought you could sleep with us for the rest of the vacation....You have slept with us before."

"Yes, but that was when I was younger. I am growing up and so you should sleep alone. What is wrong?"

"Well Mommy likes to play this game. The game was all fun before Mommy was going to have a baby. We played it every once in a while, but now Mommy wants to play it all the time."

"Well if it is a fun game, then why don't you want to play?"

"It's not as much fun for me anymore. And she wants to play it all the time."

"How does this game go?" Kristen inquired.

"Well, you see I am laying in bed and then Mommy goes into the bathroom to play dress up."

"Go on."

"Well she is in there a really long time and when she comes out, her face is all made up. She is usually wearing this really deep red lipstick that you can see first, but there are other things too. She doesn't put on the regular makeup she wears during the day, she puts on makeup with very bright colors."

"What is wrong with that?"

"Well nothing I guess, but she is also wearing special clothing?"

"Special clothing?"

"Yeah she has these bras that have a hole in front and she has this belt that she puts around her waist that has these strings that attaches to her stockings and this really really small pair of panties."

"You don't like when she dresses like this?"

"Well, before she was so uh big with the baby it looked very very pretty, but now I don't like it."

"Well Mommy can wear what she wants. Is that all?"

"No she usually dances around the room."

"Dancing is fun."

"I know it is, but she is so big I don't want to see her dancing like that."

"Mommies can dance if they want to."

"Then she dances over to me and she'll put some lotion on her hands and rub my peepee or she will kiss it with her tongue."

Kristen realizes what Stephen is talking about. Stephen has all of the memories of sex with his wife but with his lowered emotional maturity he doesn't know what it means. Kristen is just the opposite.

"Well honey, Mommy is just trying to make love to you. Mommies and daddies do that all the time."

"I know, but then do you know what she does next. She makes my peepee point towards the sky and then she gets on top of it and puts it inside herself and then she bounces up and down on me."

"It's that fun?" Kristen with her dad's emotional maturity knows that it is supposed to be 'fun'.

"Well yes, but but but...."

"But what?"

Stephen finally breaks down and admits the real problem and starts to sob, "BUT I AM SUPPOSED TO BE THE ONE ON TOP." Stephen bursts into tears.

"I know honey, I know honey," Kristen said in her most reassuring voice. "But Mommy is so big with the baby that she has to be on top now."

"I try and be good," Stephen said trying to control his tears, " but Mommy wants it all the time and she always has to be on top. She doesn't care how I feel." This was somewhat true since Amanda's hormones had been going while since she got pregnant and she was indeed always horny.

"Well sweetheart Mommy is having a tough time with the baby, you'll just have to be patient with her."

"I know, but can you come and sleep with us, that'll make her stop. I saw what she had packed and I know what she'll want me to do." Amanda had been telling Stephen what she wanted to do with him and he had been putting her off, but now that they would be alone there would be no stopping her.

"I don't think I can sleep with you and Mommy but maybe I can talk to her."

"Would you?" Stephen asked hopefully.

"You betcha. Now if you stop crying, I'll play Barbies with you." With the emotional maturity of a six-year-old girl the prospect of playing barbies appealed to Stephen much more than having sex with his pregnant wife. Stephen tried to dry his tears and put a half smile on his face.
1341211211.title: Stephen and Kristin

choices: Follow Stephen as he gets dressed
Follow the man as he returns to his family
134121122.content:
Stephen moaned as someone shook him awake. "Come on....this was fun, but...I have to get back to my family," a male voice said.

Stephen blinked several times, vision clearing. He saw a man dressed in a gray polo neck sweatshirt and a pair of denim jeans.

"I'll leave first," the male voice told him..."wait at least a few minutes before you go...okay?"

"Oui," Stephen said, automatically.

The man slipped out. Stephen tried to compose himself. His mind felt all jumbled, making it hard to think.
134121122.title: Stephen Wakes Up

1341211221.content:
Stephen stumbled to his feet, his sense of balance off. He leaned against the wall, seeing the open closet and a maid's uniform hung up there, some undergarments, and below it on the floor a pair of black heels.

Stephen turned to the mirror and saw himself standing there completely naked, with smooth hairless skin for the most part.
1341211221.title: Follow Stephen as he gets dressed

1343.content:
"No, she isn't," Kristen retorted.

"She is!" Joe shouted back and soon the two of them were arguing loudly in the foyer.

"Joseph, that is the most ridiculous thing I've ever heard," Kristen insisted. "Why don't we just go see the room and get settled in? I think everyone could use a rest."

"I'm tired," Amanda agreed.

Stephen looked at his son. "You're in charge. I'll meet you in the room. I'm going to go talk to that clerk," he said, heading toward the desk and the clerk who had taken them to the restroom.
1343.title: Stephen goes in search of answers

choices: Kristen thinks Stephen is her son
Amanda has the mind of six year old
13432.content:
Stephen looked at his son. "You're in charge. I'll meet you in the room. I'm going to go talk to that clerk," he said, heading toward the desk and the clerk who had taken them to the restroom. "Can I help you?" She asked, politely.

"You showed my wife and daughter where the bathrooms were..."

"Yes, sir?"

"My wife was pregnant when she went in and now she isn't."

"What?" The clerk said, clearly confused. "I...don't know what you mean."

"Did you see a pregnant woman?"

"Well...I remember showing a woman and her daughter to the bathroom...but I don't think she was pregnant."

"Do you think I'm making this up?" Stephen insisted.

"No, sir...but it sounds pretty impossible, if you think about it...your wife goes into the bathroom pregnant and comes out not pregnant. If you'd feel better, I could show you the inside of the ladies room."

He looked at her, and shook his head. Clearly she was not going to be of any use in getting to the bottom of this mystery. "Never mind," he said, heading upstairs to his room.

When he arrived, he instantly saw something wrong. His son was looking particularly freaked out. "Where's your Mom?"

"Kristen is putting away the clothes...and Mom is...umm..playing. Dad...something weird is going on with the suitcases too..." He trailed off as Amanda exited the bedroom.

She was wearing a short-sleeved white top, a red thigh-length skirt with little white hearts on it and a pair of black patent flats with ankle straps and ribbons on the fronts. Her hair was in a ponytail. It looked exactly like Kristen's outfit...only sized for her.

"I tried to tell you...It's like they switched brains or something." Joe said.
13432.title: Stephen Gets No Answers and Heads Upstairs

choices: Joe Stays and Tries to Sort Things Out
13433.content:
Joe took his mother and sister upstairs to the room. There was something odd going on.

As soon as they got inside, his mom flopped down on the bed, while his sister Kristen began to unpack the suitcases and put them into the drawer. "Are you just going to stand there, Joseph, or are you going to help me?" Kristen said.

"Are you feeling all right?" He asked. "Why are you acting like Mom all of the sudden?"

"Mom? What are you talking about?"

Joe was torn between staying here as his father ordered, and like his old man, going to figure out what was going on. His mother, meanwhile, seemed oblivious to it all, turning on the TV to some cartoons.
13433.title: Something Else

choices: Kristen Wants to Have Some Fun with Joe when Amanda goes to Bed
134331.content:
He sat next to his mother on the bed. "Are you all right, Mom?" When she didn't respond, he shook her gently.

She looked at him. "What?"

"Are you all right, Mom?"

She looked over at Kristen, who was unpacking, then back at him, confused.

"Amanda," Kristen called. "Come here and change into your nightgown."

"Yes, Mommy," his own mother said.

Joseph watched as Kristen pulled out a nightgown and began to help . This wasn't some sort of game. His little sister was acting like a grownup and his mother was acting like a little girl.
134331.title: Joe Stays and Tries to Sort Things Out

choices: Amanda and Joe in the lab
Stephen returns to the room (already changed)
1343311.content:
After Amanda was put to bed, Kristen told Joe that his bed time was in an hour, but they could play some cards before bed. Kristen got the cards and they played several games of 'Steal The Old Man's Bundle' before bedtime. Joe enjoyed the game and so did Kristen but not for the same reason. Joe liked to play cards and Kristen enjoyed being with Joe like any mother would with her child.

With fifteen minutes left before bedtime, Kristen told Joe to get ready for bed which meant put on his pajamas and brush his teeth. When he had done so he headed towards the room of the suite where he expected to sleep.

"Where are you going young man," Kristen demanded.

"To bed?" Joe said speculatively.

"Not in there, your room is that way?" Kristen said indicating the room that Amanda was sleeping in. That room had only one bed, whereas the other room had twin beds.

"That is where mommy sleeps."

"That's right, we can't afford a room with three bedrooms so you'll have to sleep with her. Daddy and I will be sleeping in the other room."

"You and daddy will be sleeping together?"

"Yes, what is so strange about that, we sleep together at home."

"You do?"

"Stop being silly and get into bed with Amanda." Kristen didn't only talk like an adult but she also had the authority of her mother. Joe had little choice but to do as she requested. Joe got into bed with Amanda. he felt uncomfortable about it, but couldn't go against Kristen's wishes.

Dr. Moriarty had been watching. He was going to whisk Amanda and Joe back to the lab as soon as Joe was asleep.
1343311.title: Kristen Wants to Have Some Fun with Joe when Am...

choices: Kristen and Stepehen play in bed
13433112.content:
After Amanda and Joe had gone to bed, Stephen who had spent his time trying to investigate what was happening had himself gotten swapped. He now had the body of a kindergarten girl who had come to the hotel with her class and three chaperones. The entire class had been swapped with random guests and spent the day playing as children do even though most had the bodies of adults of various ages. This included Stephen's old body.

Stephen on the otherhand had the body of a six-year-old girl and was even wearing the little girl's clothes that she had been wearing. Stephen didn't notice anything wrong about his body of how he was dressed. His clothes was typical of a little girl, jeans and a light green t-shirt which had a kitten and a sailboat imprinted on it. He also wore socks and pink sneakers and of course little girl panties.

When he arrived he asked, "Where is mommy?"

"Kristen said she is asleep with Joe."

"OH, why aren't you asleep?" Down in the lab, Dr. Moriarty was manipulating his thoughts through the chip in his head.

"You want to go to bed??? My aren't you an eager beaver." Kristen then led Stephen to a twin bed. Both being so small the bed could fit them both comfortably. Stephen hopped onto the bed and Kristen then undressed him down to his cute yellow panties with blue stars on them. Stephen then watched as Kristen also stripped down to her panties all the while dancing seductively. Soon the two 'girls' were in bed holding eachother.
13433112.title: Stephen returns to the room (already changed)

choices: Joe and Amanda play a new game
1343312.content:
"Mommy, can you sleep with me and Stephen tonight?" Amanda inquired.

"No I don't think so, married people are supposed to sleep together alone. Hunny, why do you ask?"

"Well Mommy, Stephen doesn't like to cuddle the way you do and he likes to play this game."

"What type of game?"

"I call it hide the peepee."

"Hide the peepee?" Kristen asked.

"Yes he likes to hide his peepee inside of me. Sometimes he hides it in my hands. Sometimes he hides it in my mouth. Sometimes he hides it between my breasts. Sometimes he hides it in my bum. He hides it all over me. Everywhere!!!

"Well Hunny, that is what married people like you do. You took a vow to play this game when you got married. Don't you remember," Kristen explained.

"Yes I remember Mommy,the game is fun, but sometimes Stephen finishes before I finish and then he won't help me finish and I have to finish alone. It isn't as much fun when I have to finish myself alone."

"That happens sometimes,, but that is no reason to sleep with me too. Married people are supposed to sleep alone." Kristen repeated.

"But I don't want to play the game if he won't help me finish too. I play very hard and then he just finishes and quits." Amanda said exasperated.

"Well, Hunny, I'll talk to Stephen, but I think you should tell him what you want before you start."

Joe couldn't believe what he was hearing. He was about to say something when....
1343312.title: Something Else

choices: Stephen is with a different family
134332.content:
Joe headed down to the lobby. "Excuse me," he asked the clerk at the desk. "Have you seen my dad? He was down here a moment ago."

She looked at him. "I'm afraid I'm horrible with faces. Why don't you wait right here? If he's heading upstairs...he has to pass right by this desk."

Joe tried to decide if he should wait or continue the hunt. In the meantime, the clerk began to deal with the people behind him. Joe finally made his decision, and started to move when he froze, noticing the people now standing at the desk.

One of them was his father...or was it?
134332.title: Joe Goes to Investigate

Joe gaped. It looked like his father...but everything else about him seemed to be off.

"Excuse me," he said to his father...and the people surrounding him.
1343321.title: Stephen is with a different family

13433212.content:
Stephen looked at Joe. Joe could see relief in his eyes. Before anyone can say a word, Stephen blurted out, "Joe, is that you? You have to help me. These people think I am their daughter. Help me!"

"I'm sorry," the woman who is holding Stephen's hand says. The woman is almost a foot shorter than Stephen and slight of build but she still seems to have full control over Stephen. Continuing she said, "but you have to excuse our daughter, she is just so full of imagination." Then to herself she sighed, "Ah to be young again."

"But that is my dad."

The woman knew what this ten-year-old boy stranger said was completely ridiculous. How can her sweet little three-year-old girl be anyone's dad. "I see you have a big imagination too, young man."

"I am not making this up."

"Sure, you are not," then to Stephen, "Say goodbye to the nice man, it's time to go to the room."

"He is my son, let me go," Stephen said as the woman dragged him away. Joe stood there speechless, as the woman gave Stephen a swat on his backside. "Ow!" screamed Stephen as all resistance left him. He allowed himself to be led towards the elevators all the while looking back at Joe and giving him a pleading look.

Under her breath although still audible to both Stephen and Joe, the woman said, "You must be overtired, when we get to the room, I'm going to put you in bed for a nap.."

Joe entered the elevators with Stephen and the woman as the doors closed.
13433212.title: Stephen acts differently

134332121.content:
Gas filled the elevator and by the time Stephen came to he wasn't looking at Joe anymore, he was looking at the crazy lady who said that he was her daughter. "Well, it's about strength. She looks like a tough girl... is she very strong?"

"Well, she's been living a tough life, sometimes running from the law quite literally. I wouldn't say she's very strong, but I would say that she's very fit."

"That's okay," Jimmy said. "I won't be that kind of person right now anyway."

"Well then, let's get it under way," Moriarty said, taking the young man back to the lab.

For this one, Moriarty was careful to work both with actual strength, level of fitness, and the way muscle was built. The scrawny young man gained a firm though feminine stomach along with toned and powerful thighs, shapely calves and a firm shapely buttocks. His arms became slim and toned, but would never have the potential of building large or bulging biceps. What Moriarty did not mention, but made sure to swap as well, is the way his body would store fat. Years from now, when Jimmy started go gain weight, he would find it in his thighs, hips and ass were the first places that extra weight would pile on.

For the young girl on the other end of the swap, much of her athletic nature fell away, leaving her almost model thin without tone or definition. She still possessed her feminine shape, but no longer had the underlying firmness fleshing it out. For her, she would find that staying thin was painfully easy and that while she would never be athletic or fit again, neither would she need to worry over much about dieting. Eventually, her metabolism would run down, at which point she was likely to begin to form a beer belly and love handles, but that would be years down the road to be sure.

1513.content:
One of the families Dr. Moriarty had mentioned arrived the next day, and quite a family it was too. They were your 'average' sort, certainly nothing special about them in terms of appearance.
