Dawn's 15-year old son Phillip was a handful, having being diagnosed with ADHD. Phillip was 5' 11" tall and of average build for a teenage boy. His brown hair was dyed a dirty blonde and was in a crewcut style. He was wearing a plain t-shirt, a Nike grey jacket, a pair of khaki cargo pants and some expensive brown hiking boots that cost his mother $180. Phillip sometimes used his ADHD just to annoy his mother.

Next came Dawn's 27-year old daughter Victoria, whose black permed hair was up in a messy bun. Standing about 5' 7" tall, Victoria was also a full figured woman, but nowhere near as fat as her mother. She did however have large breasts, like her mother, DD-cups. Victoria worked as a nurse in a clinic, but now she was taking some well earned time off. She was dressed in a brown coat with a grey scarf, a white short-sleeved t-shirt, a brown suede skirt with black tights underneath and a pair of knee high, fur-lined, brown leather boots with 2-inch block heels.

And accompanying Victoria was her husband Ty, who had quite a slender appearance. He was about 5' 10" and always wore facial stubble, whether or not he was just too idle to shave or not... only he knew. He had short black hair and was wearing a black jacket, a blue t-shirt, a pair of black jeans and some navy hi-top sneakers..

"PHILLIP!" Dawn shouted again, and eventually her son did as he was told. "Don't start embarrassing me again young man." she scolded him in a quieter tone, just before they all arrived at reception.

"Good day. Allow me to welcome you to the Moriarty Arms. We do hope you enjoy your stay." Chloe said with a smile.

"Yes, we got an invitation." Victoria smiled, as her mother was trying to bring Phillip into line. She did hate going anywhere with her brother, he could be, and usually was, such a pain in the ass.

"Indeed yes, we sent our several invitations, including yours. We're so glad you could make it." Chloe nodded.

And then out of nowhere Dr. Moriarty appeared to greet the new arrivals. "Hello my dear guests, allow me to extend my personal thanks for accepting the invitation, and we do hope you enjoy your stay with us." he said, clasping his hands together as he stood beside Chloe.

"Thank you!" Dawn sighed. "Can we get the key to our rooms please?" she then asked.

"Of course, here you are, you're on the second floor, Rooms 47 and 48, they're adjoining." Chloe explained, as her employer watched over her. They both knew that Victoria and Ty would probably want their own room. Once the family were checked in, Chloe looked up at Dr. Moriarty and frowned. He just gave her a smile and then chuckled a little.

"Now, now Chloe, we shouldn't judge our guests, we treat them all the same. You understand?" he told her.

"Yes sir." Chloe chirped in her cute voice as she sighed and nodded.

"Good girl. Carry on with your duties, there should be an influx of guests today, and I have to admit I'm quite excited." Dr. Moriarty said, smirking again before wandering off to a back staircase leading downstairs.

"Jeff D. Parrish. six foot one, brown hair green eyes, forty three years old. Married to wife Susan has two children Jacob age eleven, Richard age eight. Reported missing by his wife three weeks ago. Last seen driving from 'Sam's Irish Pub' at approximately 11:45 P.M. Car found the next day on the side of the road by police at approximately 2:00 AM.

Anything sound familiar?"

"No, Doesn't ring any bells"

"Maybe if Susan comes in here? She is waiting outside. Do you want to see her?"

"Why would I want to see some random woman?"

"She might jog your memory."

"Sure, why not. But, I don't think it'll work"

"OK, I'll get her. You wait here. The doctor leaves for a few minutes. Serena is left alone in the room with her thoughts.

Serena was left with a voice telling her that everything the doctor said was true. She was in a guy's body and she did have a wife. Even two children from what she was told. Yet she can't remember any of it. She starts to panic and tears start to roll down here face freely.

Several minutes later, The doctor returned with a woman behind him. Upon seeing Serena the woman bust into tears and ran towards her. She threw her arms around Serena and hugged and kissed him all over his face. "I thought I would never see you again again," she cried. There was deep hard felt emotion in everything she said.

Then to the doctor, "why is he tied up?"

"He was very disorientated. We were afraid he might hurt himself."

"Well let him go."

"I don't think that is wise yet." Then speaking directly to Serena, "So you know this woman?"

"No, I don't know who you are lady. Get off of me"

Susan stopped kissing her husband. "Jeff, it's me Susan, your wife! Don't you recognize me?" Susan sobbed even harder than before."

"Sorry, but, I've no idea who you are. I have no memories of you at all"

Susan asked the doctor, "What happened to him?"

"We honestly don't know." The doctor didn't have to explain to Susan the entire story as he had told her outside in the hall before bringing Susan into the room.

"You have to remember, Jeff. You just have to," Susan pleaded. "Don't you remember our wedding, when out children were born our first date? Anything out us?"

"I'm sorry, Susan, was it? I don't remember anything about you"

"Doctor," Susan said. "Can I bring him home. he might remember if I bring him home."

"I'm sorry Mrs. Parrish, but he can't leave.He has been ordered to stay her for at least 72 hours. Plus there are also the charges against him."

"Charges?"

"Yes be broke into a woman's room and stole her clothes. They are considering labeling a sexual predator."

"He is not. He is just sick. That's all."

"Stop talking about me as if I'm not here! I'm not going home with someone I don't know. And I'm not SICK and I'm certainly not a sexual predator"

"It's not up to me. You have to stay for at least 72 hours. Besides if I was to release you where would you go?"

"Back to MY house!"

"You mean Mrs. Sokotowski's house? Don't go there. If you do you will be arrested. Mrs. Sokotowski has a restraining order on you, you are now to go within 1000 yards of her, her home or her work at anytime. But I can assure you as long as you think you are Serena Sokotowski you will not leave this facility."

Susan left and the doctor returned. "Are you calm now?" the doctor asked. Through out this entire time, the doctor kept his emotions in check. he never showed any distress at all. He was a complete professional.

"I guess so. What's the difference?" Serena replied.

"If you are calm we can let you out of the chair and you can be with other people. If you are not calm then we'll have to put you in a straight jacket and in a special room."

Serena had visions of being locked up in a padded cell bound in the aforementioned straight jacket. She decided that she didn't know what was going on, but it would be better whether she was crazy or to help her escape if she just went along with the program. "I think I'll be OK." Serena said tentitively.

"OK, but before I let you out. What is your name?"

It took Serena a while to answer. She could lie and say her name was Jeff. But she thought the doctor might see right through that and put her into the padded cell and jacket. She could tell him she was Serena which is who she was convinced she was. Although her faith in her identity had been shaken a little bit. Even with everything else, she couldn't deny that the body she was in was definitely not Serena's. She needed time to think and assess her options. But regardless she didn't want to be tied up. "I think my name is Serena. I'm almost positive."

"Almost?"

"That's the best I can do."

"That's good enough. I'll send in an orderly to get you dressed."

A short while later, two male orderlies came in. One was carrying a pale green hospital gown, a pair of male briefs and a pair of slippers. The orderly was careful not to use a name that might upset Serena. "You're looking better than when I brought you in here," he said.

Serena didn't remember how she got here. The last thing she remembered was the scene in her hotel room. She didn't reply.

"OK, I brought you the standard issue garb. Please put it on."

Serena was hesitant to get changed. The clothes she was wearing was the only connection she still had to her former life. The clothes didn't fit right anymore. They were women's clothing and she had a male body now. But she didn't want to give them up. After a moment, she decided it was again better to go with the program rather than fight it. There was still that rubber room waiting for her. She took off her top and her slacks. She was still wearing a bra even though she didn't have any breasts to support anymore. She unhooked it from the back as if she had been doing it her entire life and then pulled down her panties. She held the panties in front of her penis to maintain her modesty. There wasn't any reason, they were both men, but somehow she felt odd naked before two men.

The orderly handed Serena the clothes and she quickly put them on. She placed her feet into the slippers and then she followed the orderly out. The other orderly trailed behind her. Serena supposed in case she panicked or bolted. She was lead into the dayroom. There were many other patients in there, all dressed similarly to how she was dressed, although she assumed the women wore panties not male briefs. But what did it matter.

Serena found an empty space in the dayroom. She had to think. She didn't know what was happening. She didn't even know if she was really Serena anymore. She started to think. She wanted to know if she was who she thought she was.

"My name is Serena Sokotowski. I am 38 years old. I'm divorced I don't have any children," she thought.

That seemed right to her.

"I am a the director of Human Resources Solutions at Libertine Reality in South Hampton, New Hampshire."

Again that seemed right to her. She could remember the place she worked, the people there, how long it had been since she received the directorship (over three years).

"My mother's name is Julie and my father is Viktor. Julie was born in America and Viktor was born in the Ukraine."

All of these facts seemed unmistakable. Nothing seemed wrong. She didn't have any memories of being a man or raising children. If she is a woman she must know what it's like to be a woman so she started to try and think of the things that only a woman would know. She remembered her first period and how her mother had told her months before that it was probably coming. She remembered how she asked her friends and some said they had already had it and others didn't. When she had it for the first time, she didn't know whether to feel overjoyed or relieved.

She remembered playing with dolls and toys. She did play with balls on occasion too, but that didn't seem odd to her. She remembered that most of her friends when she was little were girls and she could remember their names, Nancy, Kerry, Jaynis. Everything seemed perfectly normal.

She was still going through her memories when someone came over. It was a tall woman in her late twenties. She towered over her, as Serena was sitting on the floor.

"Hello?" the woman asked more than said. The woman squadded down beside her.

"Hello."

"Are you who they say you are?"

"Who do they say I am?" Serena asked misunderstanding the question.

"How should I put this," the woman said seeming to try and think of a way to ask the question correctly. "Did the staff tell you...I mean when they call you by your name...is that the name you think you are?"

Serena smiled. She wasn't crazy. This woman knows what is happening here. "NO!!! I'm not who they say I am. I'm not even really a man."

"You're not?"

"No, my name is Serena Sokotowski. I'm a woman!" Serena said almost shouting.

"SHHHHHH not so loud. They might hear you!" the woman said urgently.

"You believe me?"

"Yes."

"Even though I look like this?"

"I believe you. You might be the first person who I knwo who wasn't the same gender as they say. But you aren't the only one here who thinks...i mean KNOWS they are someone else."

"What's happening?"

"We can't talk now. We'll talk later."

"When?"

"I don't know. But it'll be soon."

"What should I do in the meantime."

"Oh act natural. But don't tell anyone, especially the staff what you told me."

"Act natural. After what I've been through?"

"Do your best. Ohhh and don't stay by yourself too long. Be with people. But remember don't tell anyone what you told me. By the way, my name is Joelly"

"Fine," Serena was relieved. Maybe something could be done. One thing was for sure, she wasn't crazy. "I'll see you later, Joelly."

Serena got out of her corner and joined a table with a few people. They seemed OK and she joined in their conversation. Everything was kept light, no one wanted to talk why they were there.

Lunch was served. There wasn't much choice. It was like eating in any cafeteria of a big organization. Serena got a grilled cheese sandwich (it was one of the few things that was heated) a bowl of soup, some soda (she didn't choice diet as she normally would have, this wasn't her body) and a piece of pound cake.

She saw Joelly around and sat at her table but didn't push her luck by talking her her directly. After lunch, the nurses and staff gathered the patients and gave out the meds. Serena looked to Joelly, who nodded her head. Serena didn't want to take medication, but she didn't want to be any trouble either. There was still the threat of the padded room and the straight jacket. If she was there, she couldn't talk to Joelly.

After the medication, Serena felt more relaxed, but didn't feel bad. Serena got into the rhythm of the place. When to wake, when to sleep, when to get dressed, when to ea, when to take medication, socializing and therapy. Joelly approached Serena(or vice versa several times) but they were disturbed by one thing or another.

As time passed, Serena's medications changed and got stronger. Her sessions with the doctors became more intense. Time lost all meaning.

In the doctor's office, Serena was given the clothes she arrived in. Pretty top, knit feminine slacks, bra and panties and ballet flats.

"What's this?" Selena asked.

"It's your clothes, Jeff You are going to go home soon."

"My clothes? My wife would bust a gut if she saw me dressed like this. You said you had my normal clothes."

"OK, I'm just kidding. You have made tremendous progress Jeff. It's hard to believe you are the same person. When you came here, you said you were a woman."

"I know. I can't believe it. I was a very sick man. But I'm all better now."

"Yes, you are certified healthy. Your wife is waiting to be let up to the ward. Anyway here are your real clothes." The doctor handed Serena all new male apparel. Red polo shirt with tan slack (male cut of course) boxers and loafers. Serena quickly got dressed.

The doctor handed Serena her discharge papers. The name on the top clearly proclaimed Jeff D. Parrish fit to return to society. Several moments later, Jeff's wife Susan appeared. Serena had seen her several times during visitors hours in the time she was here. Susan throw herself into Serena's arms. This time Serena kissed Susan back passionately. "Wait until we get home," Susan chided.

"I don't know if I can wait that long. I feel like it's been forever since we....you know."

Susan and Serena left the building holding hands like a couple who were very much in love.

After they left. Joelly entered the room. "Another happy couple."

"Yeah, and this time I didn't have to use the brain machine. Just some good old fashioned therapy with the help of some drugs."

"A married couple very much in love with two kids. None of them started out even knowing each other. Now they are a happy family. Which of them do you think changed the most?" Joelly agreed.

"I don't know. But it doesn't matter anyway. We'll monitor them for any troubles to make sure they don't revert to their former personalities.

"George, what's going on, I've been walking in high heels since I was 15." Kate said as she was beginning to have tears form in her eyes. "Why is this happening to us, George!" She said in a state of panic. She went to walk over to George so that she could have him comfort her, when she tripped on her feet. George quickly moved from the bed to catch her. After their meal, they left the table and headed back to the room. George and Kate carried on as if everything was normal. Tracy was having fun with her brother and the boots he had on his feet. "I can't wait to get back to the room and find a pair of heels for you to model." She said to her brother, who was trying to pick up the pace and get back to the room.

Back in his lab, Moriarity was observing the family and loved how the family was handling the situation. By making a game of it, they even managed to get their kids involved. Seeing Tracy and Richard have their own swap. The Dr. was beginning to think what part 2 of the experiment should be. Moriarty was thinking that he should wait until they fell asleep, but he wanted to speed things up. So he had a waiter call George and Kate over to the bar for an after dinner drink. As they walked towards the elevators, Kate stopped when she heard a familiar - and hated - voice from behind her.

"Excuse me, sir? Ma'am?" Dr. Moriarty asked, and as Kate turned, she saw he had an insufferably smug expression on his face.

"Just the man I've been looking for," Kate said, her eyes burning with hate.

"George? Who is this?" George asked, touching up his wig to try to look prettier for the distinguished gentleman.

"Ah, yes, introductions are in order," said Moriarty, who took George's manicured hand and kissed it as he would a woman's. "I am Dr. James Moriarty, owner of this hotel."

"Charmed," said George, giggling as Kate gritted her teeth.

"I had a proposition for you nice people," Moriarty continued.

"We're not interested," said Kate, remembering the last time he made her an offer.

"Oh, but George, I want to hear what it is," George said sternly.

"Excellent choice, ma'am," Moriarty said, again looking smug at Kate, who was completely boxed in and incapable of fighting back. "We had a last-minute cancellation of a wedding only minutes ago - the bride had second thoughts - and we have an entire reception hall, catered food, and the works all set to go. What we lack are a bride and groom. And given that you're here on holiday, and are clearly such a happy couple, I thought it might please you and your children for you to re-enact your wedding vows."

"I don't think so," said Kate, but George immediately glared at her.

"I think it sounds marvelous!" said George. "I only wish I had a proper dress to wear!"

Moriarty beamed.

"That's not a problem at all, ma'am," he said. I'm sure our shop could get you fitted with a lovely white gown, your husband with a tuxedo, and your children with the appropriate attire - all free of charge. All part of our commitment to make our guests' experience the best thing possible."

"Look in the mirror."

Dr. Moriarty turned to face the mirror. What he saw shocked him. He knew something was wrong but he didn't suspect this. Standing in the mirror supported by her walker was an elderly woman who was at least in her late seventies if not older. She had white permed thinning hair which was held stiff with lots of hairspray. Her face was obviously that of a woman although it was extremely wrinkled. The only makeup on her face was a small amount of lipstick surrounding her thin lips. She wore a thin sleeveless red pullover top which had faux buttons. Her breasts were supported by a heavy bra which kept them from sagging down towards her navel. Loose skin fell from her arms as if she had lost a great deal of muscle tone there leaving boney arms and excess skin. Her waist was naturally narrower than her hips which were full. If she had turned around she would have seen that her butt was saggy. She wore loose fitting knit pants that hid the cellulite full thighs and boney knees and shins. She had cankles and her feet misshapen. But all in all it was her body.

"Evelyn the transport is here. It's time to go back to The Home." said Dr.. Eisenhoffer.

"Evelyn, who is Evelyn?" Dr. Moriarty questioned but he knew.

"Why you are of course Evelyn and its time to return to your nursing home. The staff and your friends are waiting for you."

"I'm not Evelyn."

"You look like Evelyn. You'll probably have a hard time convincing anyone that you are not her."

"I'm me." Dr. Moriarty said even though he didn't remember what his real name was anymore. Dr. Eisenhoffer only adjusted Dr. Moriarty's mind slightly. He added some of the facts about Evelyn's life with Dr. Moriarty so that Dr. Moriarty could never be sure what was his true identity and what was Evelyn's. Evelyn had been diagnosed as having dimentia so no one would believe Dr. Moriarty no matter what he said. Especially if he is claiming to be a man but in some respects still talks like a woman or knew some facts about Evelyn's life thinking they were his life.

"Yes you are. What is your name?"

Thinking hard, "I don't know. You did this to me."

"I did, you tell them that. What is my name?"

Thinking hard again, Dr. Moriarty didn't know that either. When the attendant came to get him, Dr. Moriarty was still screaming at Dr. Eisenhoffer. He had to be sedated before they returned him to The Home.

Author's Note: Another take on the same theme.

"What was I saying?" Dr. Moriarty said a bit confused. Then a few seconds later, "I want to Thank You for what you are doing for me. I get confused sometimes."

"It's my pleasure Mrs. Juneau," Dr. Eisenhoffer said with a genuine smile.

"It's Evelyn," Dr. Moriarty said equaling Dr. Eisenhoffer's smile with his own.

"OK, Evelyn. Now did they explain to you the procedure?"

"It's a bit foggy."

"Well I don't blame you, you are very sick with Alzheimer's. But I can fix you up." Through the chip in Dr. Moriarty's head, Dr. Eisenhoffer made him believe he was an elderly woman who was coming here for a special treatment that'll make him better. In reality what was going to happen was that Dr. Moriarty was going to go into his own device and Dr. Eisenhoffer was going to swap his body with the real Mrs. Juneau. Of course, when Dr. Moriarty was returned to the home as Mrs. Juneau he would be a seventy eight year old nymphomaniac who would proposition any man (of any age) she ran across.

Sure the new Mrs. Juneau would be a handful for the staff at the home but Dr. Eisenhoffer would make a big donation. The real Mrs. Juneau was Dr. Eisenhoffer's mother-in-law. She hadn't been a resident of the home and didn't have Alzheimer's although she was indeed seventy-eight. She was going to get a new chance at life...well a newer one anyway. Dr. Eisenhoffer hoped that the staff wouldn't complain about Mrs. Juneau's behavior too much, of course if they did complain or at least complain to him then that staff could find him/herself in the same device that Dr. Moriarty found himself right now.

15521112221111212.content:
Dr. Moriarty stored Dr. Eisenhoffer's mind in the device. Dr. Moriarty wondered what would happen if he put Dr. Eisenhoffer's mind in a new body. This would be fun Dr. Moriarty thought as part of the personality and identity of Dr. Eisenhoffer was placed into the body of an eight year old girl.

"James, I know what you have tried to do to me and it won't work!" the girl said arrogantly.

"What I am trying to do?"

"Yes I know you want to make me your maid. Make me think I'm a peasant woman from Mexico. But it won't work. My mind is too strong for that. I knwo I am Dr. Eisenhoffer an adult man and your former supervisor at the university."

"I don't know you you are talking about."

"You have been trying to make me think I am Esmeralda Ramos. But I am not, I have been fooling you all along to make you think it's working but it isn't. I know who I am, I am Dr. Eisenhoffer!!!"

"You have me all wrong."

"You can never change me."

"That device only makes a person relax, it doesn't do mental manipulation."

"Well it won't work on me. I am as strong as I ever was." They move to a full length mirror and Dr. Eisenhoffer looks at himself to make a point. In the mirror he sees a little girl. Her brown hair is loosely braided and it extends down to her mid-torso. She is wearing a long white cardigan with a pretty brown blouse underneath. She has on black leggings and white socks. She is as cute as a button. "Look at me," Dr. Eisenhoffer said proudly, "I'm the same handsome devil as before."

"That is what I have been saying, I haven't done anything to you."

"I know the truth and you know what I will do?"

"What?"

"I am going to tell my mommy on you!!!"

"Don't do that."

"I will, I will and when she knows what you have done she will take care of you. She knows what to do with meanies like you."

"Listen sir," Dr. Moriarty said trying to appear humble. "If you don't tell, I'll get you some ice cream."

"You will? What flavor? I mean, no I'll tell her."

"I have Rocky Road from Baskin and Robbins."

"Yummy, no wait I have to tell."

"If you tell I can't give you any." Dr. Moriarty takes out the ice cream and shows it to the little girl.

"Well I suppose I don't have to tell. But I want at least two scoops."

"You can have all you want if you promise not to tell."

"OK" and the girl digs into her ice cream. Before the girl is finished Dr. Moriarty's gas descends from the ceiling putting the girl back into a deep sleep. She is then placed back into the device. Dr. Moriarty removes Dr. Eisenhoffer's partial personality from the little girl and implants a new one. This time the little girl is implanted with the personality of a hooker. Dr. Moriarty wonder's if he could pay her off with more ice cream for her services this time.

He didn't have any moral problem with making huge changes and screwing up people's lives but he didn't want the problems that might come with those changes. Mostly people noticing and then looking for what caused it and then having to deal with that.

Dr. Moriarty decided to do changes that he knew what happened but wouldn't be noticeable to the general public. The first change was simple, there was a goth girl with bright blue hair and an older woman whose greying hair had been colored to a more blondish color because of her vanity. Dr. Moriarty swapped their hair. Now if the goth girl decided to let her hair grow out she would discover that under the blue hair coloring her hair was actually grey. The hair was also a little bit thinner than before but the greying is the thing that would be noticed. The older woman who was coloring her hair would have found out that under the blonde color was a pretty auburn color but she probably would never find out. Only Dr. Moriarty knew and that was good enough for him.

The next change was a woman with small breasts and a man who had been working out who had strong pecks. Dr. Moriarty decided that under their shirts their chests was about the same size and of a similar shape. He swapped their chests, so that now the man had soft breasts under his shirt and the woman had the man's strong pecks. The man decided to work out harder to restrengthen his chest. In the end his chest was 'bigger' than it ever had been but it really didn't look right. He decided to keep his shirt on to hide his embarrassment. The woman just didn't work out and her strong manly chest became soft and flabby.

A twelve year old boy had his penis swapped with a thirty year old man. The boy was so proud of his new manhood he showed all his friends. He also developed a new found confidence with the girls. The man was so embarrassed he stopped dating, it took a good ten years before his cock was back to his full glory.

The hard pert butt of a man was swapped with the shapelier butt of a woman. From the rear it might look somewhat odd but in the end neither really had too much trouble with the exchange.
15521112222.title: Make physical swaps randomly between people

info.brief_description: Unwitting guests check into a strange hotel....
info.description:
From the Original creator: This story was largely inspired by South Wappinger Cove and I had the valuable input and friendship of the author of that story Docjr35. My special thanks goes out to him.

http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1578243-South-Wappinger-Cove
http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1710608-Swapping-Hotel
Two similar stories worth checking out :¬)

Some people are born with an urge to do the unthinkable, or the drive to do the impossible, and retired scientist Doctor James Moriarty is one of those people. Blessed with a high IQ but also a curious mind, he has set his mind to studying the field of genetics and practising the manipulation of organic matter.

To this end, he has spent considerable money and energy into building a hotel on the outskirts of a large town, a hotel in which the unsuspecting guests will become his unwitting experiments.

*The rented rooms are open to people of any ethnicity, age or gender, and allow for a maximum of over 100 guests. The rooms vary in size, and guests are allowed to stay for any length of time, from a few hours to several days or weeks. The main lobby has two elevators leading up to the upper floors, as well as a staircase. Several forms of entertainment are available to the guests, including pool, darts and poker. A large dining area is situated adjacent to the lobby and can seat 40 guests at any one time. A bar is also open at all times but excessive drinking is strictly prohibited.

*Professor Moriarty’s study and laboratory are both situated below ground level. A sleeping gas released into each room renders the guests unconscious so they can be transported down to Moriarty's laboratory through a secret door in each of the rooms.

*Anything can be exchanged between people, Gender, Age, Body (and Parts), Mind, Personality and other traits. The sky is the limit. Multiple swaps can also take place.

*People who are experimented on at the same time do not notice anything strange about themselves or those they are with, whether they be family groups, couples or individuals. The other guests and the staff throughout the hotel may notice alterations to other people, but not changes to themselves.

*RULES:
1. All chapters must be 6 or more sentences long.
2. Proper grammar and spelling is essential.
3. Absolutely no killing.

*Graphic language and sex are allowed.
*Incest and gay sex are also fine.

*Reviews and feedback/ratings would be most welcome.
* And please add your own chapters if you wish, as long as you follow the 3 main rules.
